1.0.1.en: Fixed pairing and updated to new Plejd api.

2.0.0.en: Get state using polling, sync Plejd internal clock and now using keepalive connection as default.

2.0.2.en: Get state using polling, sync Plejd internal clock and now using keepalive connection as default.

3.0.3.en: Fixed memory leak and Plejd clock

3.1.3.en: Added support for instant state change (requires Homey v6 and above)

3.2.0.en: Experimental support for WPH-01 and WRT-01

3.2.1.en: Experimental support for WPH-01 and WRT-01

3.2.2.en: Added support for WPH-01 and WRT-01

3.2.3.en: Added support for WPH-01 and WRT-01

3.2.4.en: Added support for WPH-01 and WRT-01

3.2.5.en: Added support for WPH-01 and WRT-01

3.2.6.en: New setting to disable ping messages

3.3.5.en: Fixed app from crashing when toggling multiple devices.

3.3.6.en: Fixed app from crashing when toggling multiple devices.
